snippet: Of 101 films released by the six major studios in 2012, Glaad said only 14 of them contained characters that were identified as lesbian, gay or bisexual, and none that were were transgender.
abstract: Of 101 films released by the six major studios in 2012, Glaad said only 14 of them contained characters that were identified as lesbian, gay or bisexual, and none that were were transgender.

headline.main: Study of 2012 Movies Finds Few Gay Characters on Big Screen

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Gay and Lesbian Alliance Against Defamation
